mapper.insert: insert into t_book_board( no, id, title, content ) values ( seq_t_book_board_no.nextval, #{id}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select: select no, id, title, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate from t_book_board order by no desc
select title, content from t_book_board where no = #{no}
